title: Extraterrestrial Watch Faces
summary: Art collaboration showing an alternate reality that is hiding in today’s world.
description: Extraterrestrial is the first of it’s kind art collaboration from Zuhanden available on the Google Play Store. 10 unique pieces were commissioned from artist Maarten de Boer to create this exclusive design.Each background showcases everyday places where otherworldly beings fade in and out of our field of view.From lonely back roads to familiar cities, extraterrestrial exposes an alternate reality that is hiding in today’s world.Do you believe?• 10 original works of Art• Exclusive design• Power indicators for both watch and phone• Works for round and squared watches• Also works as a wallpaper for your phone …………….….. ABOUT THE ARTIST …….…………..After seeing the classic 1951 movie “The Day the Earth Stood Still”, Dutch born Maarten de Boer has had an obsession with UFO’s, robots and other unexplained beings.Extraterrestrial represents his latest artistic expression of how these entities appear among us when we are able to move beyond our mind’s preconceived notion of reality.…………….…… PRINTS FOR SALE ………………..Prints of the artwork featured in the Extraterrestrial app are available for purchase.For more details please visit our website: http://www.extraterrestrial.world……………….. INSTAGRAM CONTEST ………………..Join the Instagram contest with the chance to win limited edition signed 12” x 18” print of the artwork used to make the Extraterrestrial app.The contest will start on January 1, 2016. To enter, post a photo of your watch or phone featuring the Extraterrestrial app to our Instagram account: @extraterrestrial.world For detailed conditions please check Instagram: @extraterrestrial.world.App Designed by Greg Wilson.Engineered in Germany.
descriptionHTML:
Extraterrestrial is the first of it’s kind art collaboration from Zuhanden available on the Google Play Store.

10 unique pieces were commissioned from artist Maarten de Boer to create this exclusive design.

Each background showcases everyday places where otherworldly beings fade in and out of our field of view.

From lonely back roads to familiar cities, extraterrestrial exposes an alternate reality that is hiding in today’s world.

Do you believe?

• 10 original works of Art
• Exclusive design
• Power indicators for both watch and phone
• Works for round and squared watches
• Also works as a wallpaper for your phone


…………….….. ABOUT THE ARTIST …….…………..

After seeing the classic 1951 movie “The Day the Earth Stood Still”, Dutch born Maarten de Boer has had an obsession with UFO’s, robots and other unexplained beings.

Extraterrestrial represents his latest artistic expression of how these entities appear among us when we are able to move beyond our mind’s preconceived notion of reality.



…………….…… PRINTS FOR SALE ………………..

Prints of the artwork featured in the Extraterrestrial app are available for purchase.

For more details please visit our website: http://www.extraterrestrial.world



……………….. INSTAGRAM CONTEST ………………..

Join the Instagram contest with the chance to win limited edition signed 12” x 18” print of the artwork used to make the Extraterrestrial app.

The contest will start on January 1, 2016. To enter, post a photo of your watch or phone featuring the Extraterrestrial app to our Instagram account: @extraterrestrial.world

For detailed conditions please check Instagram: @extraterrestrial.world.

App Designed by Greg Wilson.
Engineered in Germany.
comments: Abandoned on release day? "Ok Google" doesn't work when I apply this face. The artwork is beautiful, and the wallpaper option allows me to use it with other faces which do work, but that's just a workaround. Reported bug weeks ago.

It keeps asking you to rate it. This app is stupid. The pictures are unique but the time is hard to read at times and you can only change the background picture. It also keeps asking for you to rate it which is annoying. All and all this app needs a lot of improvments
Very Nice Great looking pn my watch, not functional, but it does look great.
I like the art work,  but I would appreciate some more customization.  Mainly I would like to have the date.
